item.title: Fly tipping in Queensgate Mews, 25th February
item.description:
Dumping of a mattress and other waste in Queensgate Mews by my side gate. A recurrent and repeated issue with fly tipping in that location.

item.title: Damage to road, 25th February
item.description:

item.title: The sewage tank on this property has been leaking for months and the smell and sewage seems to be leaking into our property next door., 25th February
item.description:
We live in Eden Apartments, 9 Beckenham Lane and have noticed an extremely bad sewage smell from the neighbours next door at 5 Glebe Knoll, Beckenham Lane, Bromley BR2 0DA. The septic tanks have been rumours times, not sure if they are pumping the tanks but a resident has told us that the tanks are leaking. When it is warm outside the smell is unbearable and we fear the sewage might be leaking into our garden and nearby stream between the 2 properties. The tank seems to be located on the right side of the property which is between our block and theirs. This issues has been going for over 5 months now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Lane, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
